City Council
============

215 E. McKinney St. Denton TX 76201

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/215+E.+McKinney+St.+Denton+TX+76201)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

215 E. McKinney St.  
Denton, TX 76201

Link: [City Council Page](https://www.cityofdenton.com/413/City-Council)  
  

To email all members of the Denton City Council at once, please [visit the City Council webpage](https://www.cityofdenton.com/413/City-Council) and use the form at the bottom of the page.

### Contact Us

1. 601 East Hickory Street
2. Denton, TX 76205
3. Phone:  [(940) 349-7311](tel:%209403497311)
4. Monday through Friday  
   8 a.m. to 5 p.m.
5. Closed Saturday & Sunday
